title: Hemodialysis and imatinib: Plasma levels, efficacy and tolerability in a patient with metastatic GIST - Case report
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Ida De Luca, Daniela Miliziano, Giulia Guerra, Roberto Colombo, Carlo Morosi, Carlo Sposito, Marco Fiore, Elisabetta Venturelli, Claudia Sangalli, Paolo G. Casali, Adalberto Cavalleri, Elena Fumagalli
